name: Intelligence Gathering on Covert Networks
description: Training in methods of collecting intelligence on covert organizations, shadow groups, and classified networks.

cards.title: Identifying Covert Networks
cards.description: Recognizing the signs and indicators of hidden organizations.
bulletpoints: Analyzing patterns of secrecy and obfuscation.
Identifying key members and connections.
Recognizing common tactics used by covert groups.

cards.title: Open Source Intelligence (OSINT) Techniques
cards.description: Leveraging publicly available data to uncover covert operations.
bulletpoints: Utilizing advanced search methods for deep data extraction.
Cross-referencing leaks, archives, and open-source documents.
Building intelligence profiles from social media and digital footprints.

cards.title: Dark Web Reconnaissance
cards.description: Navigating and extracting intelligence from hidden online forums and marketplaces.
bulletpoints: Utilizing anonymization tools for secure exploration.
Analyzing threat actors and covert communication methods.
Monitoring illicit transactions and trafficking networks.

cards.title: Human Intelligence (HUMINT) Operations
cards.description: Gathering intelligence through direct human interaction and infiltration.
bulletpoints: Building sources and cultivating informants.
Detecting deception and reading microexpressions.
Understanding psychological pressure tactics in elicitation.

cards.title: Electronic Surveillance and SIGINT
cards.description: Intercepting and analyzing electronic communications from covert networks.
bulletpoints: Understanding encryption and decryption techniques.
Utilizing radio frequency monitoring and signal interception.
Tracking geolocation metadata from intercepted transmissions.

cards.title: Deconstructing Front Organizations
cards.description: Tracing shell corporations, fake NGOs, and other covers used by covert groups.
bulletpoints: Identifying financial transactions and laundering schemes.
Mapping corporate and governmental overlaps.
Analyzing front group activities in relation to elite control systems.

cards.title: Counter-Surveillance and Tradecraft
cards.description: Avoiding detection while gathering intelligence in hostile environments.
bulletpoints: Employing evasive maneuvers and deception tactics.
Detecting surveillance and neutralizing tracking attempts.
Establishing secure communication channels and dead drops.

cards.title: Blackmail Files and Compromised Assets
cards.description: Uncovering and analyzing elite blackmail operations and intelligence leverage points.
bulletpoints: Investigating blackmail networks and kompromat operations.
Understanding how elite power structures use coercion tactics.
Revealing vulnerabilities and leveraging counterintelligence strategies.

cards.title: Safe Data Extraction & Secure Reporting
cards.description: Protecting intelligence and delivering it securely to trusted parties.
bulletpoints: Utilizing encrypted storage and secure data transfer methods.
Establishing anonymous leak protocols and whistleblower channels.
Evading digital forensics and tracking mechanisms.

cards.title: Constructing Intelligence Networks
cards.description: Building decentralized intelligence-sharing networks to counter elite operations.
bulletpoints: Establishing underground information-sharing cells.
Using blockchain and decentralized platforms for data security.
Training operatives in intelligence gathering and secure communication.
